definition.name: Hugo setup
definition.description: GitHub Actions for Hugo ⚡️ Setup Hugo quickly and build your site fast. Hugo extended and Hugo Modules are supported.
definition.author: peaceiris

inputs.name: hugo-version
inputs.description: The Hugo version to download (if necessary) and use. Example: 0.58.2

inputs.name: extended
inputs.description: Download (if necessary) and use Hugo extended version. Example: true
